channel.title: impeachment on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in impeachment on PepsFeeder

item.title: Trump impeachment case: a six-year "drama" with a farce behind it
item.description: Impeached by the House of Representatives and acquitted by the Senate … In just 50 days, Trump, the 45th President of the United States, experienced two very historic moments during his tenure.

item.title: US House Intelligence Committee approves Trump's impeachment
item.description: Washington – The US House of Representatives Intelligence Committee on Tuesday approved a report dismissing US President Donald Trump, the Bloomberg News Agency reported. The Committee adopted the report by 13 votes to 9.
